name: usgredg2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c2, c1)), nat2))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c2, c1)), nat2), wcel(c0, cumgr))
stmt.pretty: sylan(c0 ∈ USGraph, c1 ∈ dom(c2), (# `(c2 ` c1))= 2, c0 ∈ UMGraph)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c2, c1)), nat2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cumgr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c2, c1)), nat2))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ c1 ∈ dom(c2))→(# `(c2 ` c1))= 2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ UMGraph)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ UMGraph ∧ c1 ∈ dom(c2))→(# `(c2 ` c1))= 2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c2, c1)), nat2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cumgr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c2, c1)), nat2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ c1 ∈ dom(c2))→(# `(c2 ` c1))= 2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ UMGraph)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ UMGraph ∧ c1 ∈ dom(c2))→(# `(c2 ` c1))= 2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c2, c1)), nat2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c2, c1)), nat2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c2, c1)), nat2))
-| wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfv(cvtx, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ciedg, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ UMGraph ∧ c1 ∈ dom(c2))→(# `(c2 ` c1))= 2)
⊣ (Vtx ` c0)=(Vtx ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(iEdg ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c2, c1)), nat2))
-| wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfv(cvtx, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ciedg, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ c1 ∈ dom(c2))→(# `(c2 ` c1))= 2)
⊣ (Vtx ` c0)=(Vtx ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(iEdg ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, cdm(c2))), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c2, c1)), nat2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ciedg, c0))

comment: The value of the "edge function" of a simple graph is a set containing two elements (the vertices the corresponding edge is connecting). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Aug-2017.) (Revised by AV, 16-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Dec-2020.)
